data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 8
data.actual_result: It overlaps with the send button.
data.expected_result: The long username shouldn't overlap with the send button and be shorten before it.
data.short_description: Nearby Friends: Very long usernames overlap with the send button
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have 2 accounts and iOS devices - One account should have a very long name such as `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` - Go the friends tab - Click on the add friends symbol - Search for nearby friends with both devices - Observe the long username with your iPhone
